scenario.title: Getting data about disrupted streets in London today
scenario.step: Given I want to know the streets that are disrupted today
Then I should get the streets that are disrupted today

scenario.title: Getting data about disrupted streets in London today
scenario.step: Given I want to know the streets that were disrupted yesterday

scenario.title: Getting data about disrupted streets in London today
scenario.step: Given I want to know the streets that are disrupted last monday
When I select last monday date
